name: @aptre/common
description: Common project configuration files and dependencies.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json --noEmit false --outDir ./dist/
scripts.ci: npm run build && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:go
scripts.format: npm run format:go && npm run format:js && npm run format:config
scripts.format:js:changed: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep '\(\.ts\|\.tsx\|\.html\|\.css\|\.scss\)$' | xargs -I {} prettier --write {}
scripts.gen: rimraf ./.tools && go mod tidy && cd ./tools && go mod tidy && cd ../ && bash embed.bash && npm run format && make genproto
scripts.lint: npm run lint:go && npm run lint:js
scripts.release:commit: git reset && git add package.json && git commit -s -m "release: v$npm_package_version" && git tag v$npm_package_version
scripts.release:publish: git push && git push --tags && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release: npm run release:version && npm run release:commit
